titleStmt.title: An essay upon the works of creation and providence being an introductory discourse to the history of remarkable providences now preparing for the press : to which is added a further specimen of the said work : as also Meditations upon the beauty of holiness / by William Turner ...
titleStmt.author: Turner, W. (William), fl. 1687-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Dunton ... and are also sold by Edm. Richardson ...,

notesStmt.note: "Meditations upon the beauty of holiness" (p. 111-160) has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
"A scheme of the history of remarkable providences, now preparing for the press": p. [1]-[34] at end.
